segments.text: Hello , Jane . What do you do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , nothing special , reading , watching TV , walking , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you have any hobbies , like stamp collecting or things like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't have any hobbies . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like collecting antiques . It's expensive , but it's a lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? How many collections do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So far I have more than 500 collections .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Among those collections , which is the most expensive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A set of ancient china . It is really invaluable .
segments.speaker: S1
